welcome.termsText: By continuing, you agree to our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy
welcome.introTitle: There's so much we want to show you — but where should we start?
welcome.introDescription: Tell us what you like, and we'll connect you with brands that match your values, interests, and needs.

warning.title: Time for an update!
warning.subtitle: Unlock new features and a smoother experience by updating your app

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: ledge would like to keep you updated about new brands in your 'For You' section and other ledge-related news.
notifications.enableDescription: To enable notifications, you must go to your device settings and allow notifications for the ledge app.

changeEmail.title: Change Email
changeEmail.verificationMessage: We've sent you a verification email to your new email address. Please verify your new email address to make the change effective.

language.title: Language
language.description: For the best experience, use the English version. Our German version is still in beta.

shoppingFor.title: Who are you shopping for?
shoppingFor.description: You can adjust the preliminary filters for your 'For You' section here.

shoppingFrom.title: Where are you shopping from?
shoppingFrom.description: You can adjust the preliminary filters for your 'For You' section here.

myDataView.title: What happens to my data?
myDataView.description: Learn more about our exceptional efforts to safeguard your data here.

benefitsList.collect: Tired of ads? We hear you!
benefitsList.description: We've teamed up with trusted partners to bring you real solutions. Minimize your ad and data exposure across the web and enjoy with each new level more high-quality, ad-free content.

myDataDeletedBrands.title: Where are my deleted brands?
myDataDeletedBrands.description: Here you can reflect on your past decisions and restore your deleted brands.

benefitsList.collect: Tired of ads? We hear you!
benefitsList.description: We've teamed up with trusted partners to bring you real solutions. Minimize your ad and data exposure across the web and enjoy with each new level more high-quality, ad-free content.

deleteData.title: Delete all my data
deleteData.description: You can delete all your data here.
deleteData.menuTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your data?
deleteData.menuDescription: This step can not be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted from our servers with no way to restore it.

didWin.title: Congratulations!
didWin.subtitle: You've unlocked a free gift from our Christmas calendar. Enjoy your reward!

didNotWin.title: Thank you!
didNotWin.subtitle: You just missed today's special Christmas deal, but don't worry — our welcome offer is still waiting for you, and you can try again tomorrow!

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.subtitle: To personalize your experience, we would like to know a few things about you as a consumer.
welcome.subtitleBack: Do you have a minute for a quick question?
welcome.info: Learn more about our exceptional efforts to safeguard your data here.

thankYou.title: Thank you!
thankYou.subtitle: This way we can personalize your experience.
thankYou.subtitleFounder: This will help our founders learn more about their audience and improve their products.

pendingInteraction.title: Hey there!
pendingInteraction.subtitle: You have a pending interaction with a brand. Would you like to continue?
pendingInteraction.skip: Take me to the brand profile

levelAnimation.title: Congratulations! You've reached a new rank!

brandProfile.adventCalendarDealSubtitle: You've unlocked a free gift from our Christmas calendar. Just put 'product name' in your cart and apply the code at checkout!

locked.title: Hey there!
locked.description: Explore our brand profile, and if it interests you, connect with me for an exclusive deal

unlocked.title: Thank you!
unlocked.description: To redeem your deal, copy the code to your clipboard, head to our web shop, and enter the code at checkout

brandProfile.noUsersfeedback: There's not feedback from the users yet :c

feedbackModal.title: Do you have any additional feedback?
feedbackModal.email: Add Email if you want a response

questions.questionnaireError: There was an error getting the questionnaire :(

thankYou.title: Thank you!
thankYou.subtitle: Your feedback helps us improve our brand and products.
thankYou.learn: Learn more about our exceptional efforts to safeguard your data here.

poolRefil.noMoreSubtitle: Take a break. We'll update you as soon as new brands are available.

termsAndConditions.start: Before we start you need to accept our

forYou.thirdTitle: to get to the next brand

connect.question: Do you have any additional feedback or questions?
connect.addEmail: Add Email if you want a response
connect.otherFeedback: What other users have to say

productFeedback.title: Feedback
productFeedback.welcomeSubtitle: It's been two weeks since you bought one of our products

default.errorMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again

unauthorizedError.errorMessage: You are not authorized to access this resource

forbiddenError.errorMessage: Access forbidden. You don't have permission to access this resource

notFoundError.errorMessage: The requested resource was not found

serverError.errorMessage: The server encountered an error. Please try again later

authenticationError.errorMessage: Authentication failed. Please log in again

networkError.errorMessage: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection

myBrands.title: Ready for an Adventure?
myBrands.subtitle: Head over to the "Explore" section and connect with our founders!

forYou.title: You've connected with all your personal picks!
forYou.subtitle: Go for a walk instead, or swipe through more categories.

browse.title: No products to explore
browse.subtitle: Take a break and go for a walk instead. We'll update you as soon as new brands are available.

invite.title: ledge is better with friends
invite.subtitle: We've connected you with our founders, Vali & Zachi, to get you started! You'll see their favorite brands & insights in your feed. Add more friends to make your experience even better!

setup.title: Finish your Profile!
setup.subtitle: We've pre-filled your name and home and also randomly picked an Avatar. Feel free to adjust.
